description: I had to manually copy the .html files that I built locally so that the nova.openstack.org site was updated with the latest built docs. Let me know if I can help - it works on the Swift site so not sure what's different on the Nova site.
title: Build process isn't automatically copying docs/build/*.html files to correct location

comments.content: I had to manually copy the .html files that I built locally so that the nova.openstack.org site was updated with the latest built docs. Let me know if I can help - it works on the Swift site so not sure what's different on the Nova site.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content:
This was a problem in the hudson job http://hudson.openstack.org/job/nova/. It was looking for docs in docs/_build/html rather than in doc/build/html.

Then, sadly, it was failing to copy the files but still reporting a successful job run.

Fixed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mordred
